dt-option.name: language.aria.paginate.next
dt-option.summary: WAI-ARIA label for the _next_ pagination button
dt-option.description:
Set the ARIA label attribute for the _next_ pagination button. This can be particularly useful for cases where you wish to show an icon such as `»` or `›` in the button itself, while retaining full accessibility.
Please note that the default value was updated for DataTables 2 to contain a value (previously it was an empty string) due to the use of a UTF-8 character being used for display in the button.

example.title: Use icons for the previous and next buttons with ARIA label text
